ApplnRenderMethodAssignment.name: ApplnRenderMethodAssignment
ApplnRenderMethodAssignment.description: Represents an assignment of the application render method to a component that's rendered in the application.

ApplicationComponentId.description: The component that's rendered in an application.

ApplicationRenderMethodId.description: The Application Render Method associated with the component that's rendered in an application.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the assignment is active (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the Application Render Method Assignment.
